mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pictures (reviewdetail_id, picture_original, picture_modify) VALUES (#{reviewDetailId}, #{originalName}, #{url})
mapper.select: SELECT id, reviewdetail_id as reviewDetailId, picture_original as originalName, picture_modify as url, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM pictures WHERE reviewdetail_id = #{reviewDetailId}
SELECT picture_modify as url FROM reviewdetails d JOIN pictures p ON d.id = p.reviewdetail_id WHERE d.review_id = #{reviewId} ORDER BY d.day ASC LIMIT 1;
